title: Change your air
action: Open a window or step outside. 60 seconds of different air on your skin. Notice the temperature.

title: Hands on stone
action: Find the hardest surface near you. Press both palms flat. Feel the cold. Stay for 30 seconds.

title: Walk the edges
action: Walk the perimeter of whatever room you're in. Touch each wall. Slow.

title: Name five textures
action: Without moving, identify five different textures you can see. Say them out loud.

title: Cold water reset
action: Run cold water over your wrists for 20 seconds. Focus on the sensation. Nothing else.

title: Three deep exhales
action: Inhale naturally. Then exhale twice as long as you inhaled. Three times. That's it.

title: Peripheral vision
action: Soften your gaze. Without moving your eyes, notice what's at the very edges of your vision. Hold for 60 seconds.

title: Shake it off
action: Stand up. Shake your hands vigorously for 15 seconds. Then your arms. Then your whole body. Stop. Feel the stillness.

title: Listen to the room
action: Close your eyes. Count every distinct sound you can hear. Don't judge them. Just count.

title: Write one sentence
action: Grab something to write with. Write one sentence about what's present right now. Don't edit it.

title: Feet on earth
action: Take your shoes off. Stand on the ground â€” grass, dirt, tile, whatever's there. Feel the surface for 2 minutes.

title: Hum one note
action: Pick any note. Hum it. Feel the vibration in your chest. Hold it as long as one breath allows. Repeat 3 times.

title: Rearrange one thing
action: Pick up one object near you and put it somewhere else. Deliberately. Notice how the space changes.

title: Slow drink
action: Get a glass of water. Drink it as slowly as you can. Feel the temperature. Feel it go down.

title: Look up
action: Tilt your head back. Look at the ceiling or sky for 30 seconds. Notice what happens to your breathing.

title: Bilateral tap
action: Cross your arms over your chest. Alternate tapping left and right shoulders. Slow, steady rhythm. 2 minutes.
